SELECT DD.DOCTYPE_ID, DT.DOCTYPE_NAME, GROUP_CONCAT(D.DEPT_NAME ORDER BY DD.DEPT_ID SEPARATOR ', ') AS DEPTS FROM DOCTYPE_DUTY DD JOIN DOC_TYPE DT ON DD.DOCTYPE_ID = DT.DOCTYPE_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON DD.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID WHERE DD.DUTY_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY DT.DOCTYPE_NAME
